questiontext.text:
John sells bicycles. From the commission of 10% of the gross proceeds he receives for each Gazelle sold, he will earn €25, and € 40 for each Batavus sold. On a sunny Saturday in May, he estimates his sales of Gazelle and of Batavus as follows:

————————— —– —– —– —– Gazelle bicycles sold 0 1 2 3 Probability 0.1 0.2 0.5 0.2 ————————— —– —– —– —–

————————— —– —– —– Batavus bicycles sold 0 1 2 Odds 0.2 0.3 0.5 ————————— —– —– —–

What is the expected value of John’s earnings in Euros that are Saturday?
